quantum-physics.title: Numerical Methods in Quantum Mechanics
quantum-physics.description: Solving the Schrödinger equation for non-standard potentials using Python and NumPy.
quantum-physics.content:
Research Overview

This project involved developing a Python-based solver for the time-independent Schrödinger equation.

classes.name: Modern Physics
classes.learned: Special relativity, wave-particle duality, and an introduction to the Schrödinger equation.

classes.name: Calculus I
classes.learned: Limits, derivatives, and the fundamental theorem of calculus with applications to physical systems.
